title: Ukraine updates: Finland backs NATO; Russia vows 'retaliatory' steps
content:
1. Ukraine updates: Finland backs NATO; Russia vows 'retaliatory' steps  USA TODAY
  2. Finland to apply for Nato membership after Russia's invasion of Ukraine - BBC News  BBC News
  3. Kremlin calls Finland's NATO move a threat to Russia  Fox News
  4. The Guardian view on expanding Nato: Putin has only himself to blame  The Guardian
  5. How Russia Could Respond If Finland Joins NATO  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ウクライナ最新情報。フィンランドはNATOを支持し、ロシアは「報復措置」を宣言。
